title: Steve Jobs' Widow Begged DiCaprio, Bale Not To Play Her Husband
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Celebrity - Today 
"Steve Jobs" -- aka "the good Steve Jobs biopic" -- was released today to stellar reviews. And its star, Michael Fassbender, is already con...
